agenda.description: ** REVISION ** HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Natural Resources TIME & DATE: 10:30 AM or upon final adjourn./recess or bill referral if permission granted Tuesday, March 12, 2019 PLACE: E2.010 CHAIR: Rep. Lyle Larson The committee will meet to consider the following bills: HB 1479 King, Tracy O. Relating to the transfer of certain permitted irrigation water rights related to a certain portion of the Edwards Aquifer. HB 817 King, Tracy O. Relating to a restriction on permits authorizing direct discharges of waste or pollutants into water in certain areas of the Edwards Aquifer. HB 1506 Perez Relating to authorizing a regulatory authority to establish reduced water and sewer utility rates funded by donations for the benefit of certain low-income customers. HB 1964 Ashby | et al. Relating to the procedure for action on certain applications for an amendment to a water right. HB 1574 Paddie Relating to the composition of the Riverbend Water Resources District and the terms of the board of directors of that district. HB 807 Larson Relating to the state and regional water planning process. HB 1617 Larson Relating to the deadline by which the Texas Water Development Board is required to identify and designate brackish groundwater production zones for certain areas of the state. Bills deleted after last posting: HB 1904 ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions ** of the schedule, if applicable. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
